Text: Checked the HTML version and it all seems there.  Thanks whitemagic women for the upload.  I am overseas and have limited access to good sf.

Thanks for the props, Skorpyan!  This is the first torrent I've ever made!  

Other ebook titles on the CD include Crown of Slaves, Shadow of Saganami, In Fury Born, and the Mutineer's Moon series.  If you are missing any other Weber works, let me know and I will tell you if I have them.  I don't mind starting more torrents if there's a desire for them.
